snippet.title: The Last Stand: Aftermath Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: http://armor.ag/tlsas

A brand new single-player, rogue-like adventure from the creators of The Last Stand series. Exiled from your post-apocalyptic home base after contracting the virus, how long can you survive beyond its walls? Long enough to make a difference?

📣 Community 📣
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ConArtistGames
Discord: https://discord.gg/AjXXAgv
Homepage: http://armor.ag/tlsa_ags
